name: BreastRadMammoSkinRetraction
title: Skin Retraction
description:
Skin Retraction Observation


The skin is pulled in abnormally
-- Bi-Rads® Atlas — Mammography Fifth Ed. 2013 
If this observation is present, and dataAbsentReason is empty, then a skin retraction was observed.


If this observation is present, and dataAbsentReason is not empty, then a skin retraction was not observed and dataAbsentReason contains the reason why.
